activities:
Customers of the ITRP service submit data to the ITRP service as part of their use of the ITRP service.This data is only visible to people explicitly authorized by the customer's administrator to access their customer data which generally does not include ITRP Institute employees. Personal data stored in a customer's ITRP account may include:
-	Name (first and last)
-	Email
-	Job title
-	Support ID
-	Organization
-	Manager
-	Location
-	Location
-	Telephone
-	Website
-	Address
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: The personal data for employees, long-term contractors and their vendors or customers as submitted by the customer in the customer's ITRP account. This data is stored in the ITRP database and transmitted (encrypted) when the information needs to be accessed by the customer. The data is not entered or accessed by the ITRP Institute.
